data.actual_result: After a bit, the channel is reset
data.expected_result: It stays like how you changed it
data.short_description: Creating an invite for a server and changing the channel for the invite and waiting changes back to the original channel (by this i mean if you change it for regeneration the invite to put in another channel will reset back to the channel you made the invite in originally)
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an invite to a channel on a server - Change the location of it however don't regenerate the invite - Wait a few seconds on the invite main area
